name: Quiche Lorraine
recipeIngredient: 1 cup grated Gruyere or cheddar cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350F. Cook the bacon in a large frying pan on medium heat, drain fat, cool on paper towels, then chop into small pieces.

Whisk the eggs in a large bowl, adding in nutmeg, salt, black pepper, and chives. Add the milk and cream, whisking vigorously to add some air into the mix. Add bacon and cheese, and pour into pie crust.
